allow-location-dialog.title: Allow access to your location
allow-location-dialog.description: Cozy needs to be able to access your location in order to record your movements. This may consume a little battery power, but you can always disable the feature from your CO2 Coach settings.

install-flagship-app-dialog.title: Scan the QR Code
install-flagship-app-dialog.text:
or go directly to the App Store
or Play Store to install the Cozy Cloud app
install-flagship-app-dialog.a11n: Go to the Cozy Cloud application download page

authentification-dialog.title: Login
authentification-dialog.subtitle: For security, please confirm your identity
authentification-dialog.label: Cozy password

errors.server_error: Something went wrong with the server. Please, reload the page.
